Hello

I'm Wiktoria - UX Researcher and Designer with a passion for good design.

I believe good design is all about usability and proper communication. That's why whilst creating products I try to answer two main questions: for whom and why?

My main goal is to create “how have we ever lived without it” products.

Read more

What do I do?

01

UX Research

  • find any new problems and notice trends
  • get to know your audience, their needs and motivations
  • evaluate your ideas and design
02

UX Design

  • make product design usable, enjoyable, and accessible
03

UI Design

  • create a visually stunning and intuitive interface for users of digital products
